column1: The name is [[Quenya]] and contains the elements ''[[anna]]'' "gift" + ''[[dor]]'' "land".<ref>{{S
Similarly, the native name Yôzâyan seems to contain the Adûnaic word '' zâyan'' "land".<ref>{{SD
